name: Poisoned Ink
description:
In poisoned Ink you control a young boy named squid. For some unknown reason the people living in your town have fallen ill to an mysterious illness. Trying to find something to do you wander into the deeper parts of the woods close by. But instead of a fun afternoon you find yourself admist a completly destroyed forest filled with poison monsters. Could these beasts be connected to that weird illness?

-- disclaimer --

This Project was made as a Final submission for a game development course I'm taking at uni. Since this was my very first experience with unreal as well as created in a very short amount of time it is far from being perfect or finished. In terms of story you could see this as Chapter one of many, since the end is still open.

(Sounds are from Zapsplat.com)

Either way I hope you enjoy it an don't judge too harshly! <3
